[[רְאֵמָא]], [[רֵימָא]], [[רֵימָנׇא]] raymo0 (Lag:BN 58); Ar. ra0’mah;un is white antelope, antilope leucoryx; LXX (erron.) monoke/rwv (Is 34:7 a(/droi, Vulgate unicornis, and (oftener) rhinoceros);—abs. ´[[ר]]: Nu 23:22 +, [[רְאֵים]] Ps 92:11, [[רֵים]] Job 39:9, Job 39:10; pl. Baer);—wild ox, as fierce and strong Job 39:9, Job 39:10; sim. of strength of Isr., [[לוֹ]] ´[[כְּתוֹעֲפוֹת ר]]: Nu 23:22 = Nu 24:8 (JE), [[וַתָּרֶם כִּרְאֵם קַרְנִי]] Ps 92:11; so fig. of Joseph, [[קַרְנַיו]] ´[[קַרְנֵי ר]]: De 33:17; fig. of princes of Edom Is 347 ( +[[פָּרִים עִם אַבִּירִים]]); of powerful foes, [[מִקַּרְנֵי רֵמִים]] Ps 22:22; in sim. of skipping, leaping, [[בֶּן־רְאֵמִים]] Ps 29:6 (‖[[עֵגֶּל ]]).
